summary:
Adds a Hulk Action Figure into the game.
Optional File With Pickup Sound Effect Available
descriptionHtml:
[center]The Hulk Action Figure

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/20329-1-1342054070.png[/img]

Description:
============

Simply put.

Adds The Hulk Action Figure into the game

(This is my first mod so i thought i would start with something simple)

===============
Installation:
===============

Install With NMM

Or

1. Extract the contents into your Data Folder
2. Enable the .esp

Ingame
===============

Load Console
Type help hulk
should see: MISC: (xxxxxxxx) \"Hulk Action Figure\"
player.additem xxxxxxxx 1

Will be located in Inventory | Misc

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

Uninstall using NMM

Or

Delete the following:

Data\\ *xhulk.esp*
Data\\meshes\\ *clutter\\toy\\The Hulk*
Data\\textures\\ *clutter\\toy\\The Hulk*

If you picked up the Optional File, must delete

Data/sound/fx/ *hulk.esp/* as well

=================
Update 7-15-12
=================

*Optional File Added*

[youtube]8lSwsGkQffE?hd=1&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]

=================
Credits:
=================

-For Helping Me Create World Model Meshes-

and of course

[url=http://www.bethsoft.com]Bethesda[/url]
&
[url=http://marvel.com]Marvel[/url]

[/center]
author: Xrated
